entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 70%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of light snow near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:25 PM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 26. POP 30%
